Module Contents¶

Functions¶

set_entrez_param(→ None)

Sets entrez parameters
CodonU.file_handler.set_entrez_param.set_entrez_param(email: str | None = None, api_key: str | None = None) → None¶

Sets entrez parameters

Parameters:

  • email – Email of the user (optional)

  • api_key – API key of the user (optional)

Raises:

  • EmailWarning – If no email is provided

  • ApiWarning – If no API key is provided
